SEARCH
Package org.jboss.resteasy.annotations.cache

Annotation Interface Cache

@Target({TYPE,METHOD}) @Retention(RUNTIME) @Inherited public @interface Cache
Set response Cache-Control header automatically.
Version:
$Revision: 1 $
Author:
Bill Burke
